alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Houston (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 15 at 7:55PM CST until December 15 at 8:15PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN HOUSTON AND EASTERN FILLMORE COUNTIES... At 755 PM CST, a severe squall line capable of producing both tornadoes and extensive straight line wind damage was located over Lanesboro, or near Preston, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. These dangerous storms will be near... Rushford around 805 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Henrytown, Choice, Perkins, Old Barn Campground, Isinours, Peterson and Money Creek. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
